com.landicorp.android.eptapi.service

类 SystemServiceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.landicorp.android.eptapi.service.SystemServiceManager

  • public class SystemServiceManager
extends Object
    系统服务管理器，用于获取或新增系统服务。
    作者:
    chenwei

      • getService

        public static IBinder getService(String serviceName)
                          throws SecurityException,
                                 NoSuchMethodException,
                                 ClassNotFoundException,
                                 IllegalArgumentException,
                                 IllegalAccessException,
                                 InvocationTargetException
        获取某系统服务的binder
        参数:
        serviceName -
        返回:
        返回服务的Binder
        抛出:
        SecurityException
        NoSuchMethodException
        ClassNotFoundException
        IllegalArgumentException
        IllegalAccessException

      • addService

        public static void addService(String serviceName,
                              IBinder binder)
                       throws SecurityException,
                              NoSuchMethodException,
                              ClassNotFoundException,
                              IllegalArgumentException,
                              IllegalAccessException,
                              InvocationTargetException
        注册一个Binder为系统服务
        参数:
        serviceName - 服务名
        binder - 要注册的binder
        抛出:
        SecurityException
        NoSuchMethodException
        ClassNotFoundException
        IllegalArgumentException
        IllegalAccessException
        InvocationTargetException
